title: Idylls - Prayer For Terrene (320kbps)
description:
Idylls is a band that makes hugely intense, harsly noisy music which could be categorized as hardcore, though that doesn't really do it justice. It's more like being repeatedly smashed in the face by a leaden hammer, with a big smile on your face all the while. In case you haven't figured it out by now: this is probably the most intense record you will hear this year.

Idylls - Prayer For Terrene
Release date: April 2014
